title: Plan Session
when-do-you-plan-to-drink: When do you Plan to Drink?
what-type-of-drink-will-you-stick-with: What Type of Drink Will you Stick With?
what-time-do-you-want-to-stop: What Time do you Want to Stop?
whats-your-maximum-number-of-drinks: What's Your Maximum Number of Drinks?
whats-your-budget-for-the-night: What's Your Budget for the Night?
planned-stop-time-description:
A planned stop time <0>gives you 
 control</0>. Your mind prepares to wrap 
 up naturally, <1>making it easier</1> to stick 
 to your intention.
drink-limit-description:
Setting a <0>drink limit</0> beforehand helps 
 your brain recognize when to stop. 
 People typically <1>drink less</1> when they 
 decide on a number first.
max-spending-description:
Setting a <0>spending limit</0> keeps 
 you intentional and prevents 
 morning regrets. <1>It protects both</1> 
 your wallet and your wellbeing.
drink-type-description: <0>Stick to one type of drink</0> to keep your body steady. <1>Choose longer drinks</1> over shots to naturally pace yourself.
plannedEndTime-must-be-after-plannedStar: Planned end time must be after planned start time
session-duration-must-not-exceed-3-hours: Session duration must not exceed 3 hours
maxDrinkCount-must-be-greater-than-0: Max drink count must be greater than 0
